Text:
thanks. i uploaded the book for the series if anyone wants it.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6240400/Civilization__The_West_and_the_Rest_-_epub

This is the STUPIDEST documentary I ever wasted my time watching. Avoid this one guys, this has nothing to do with civilization coming to an end, or society crumbling under the weight of corruption or anything like this. IT'S ABOUT PEOPLE IN OTHER COUNTRIES WEARING AMERICAN DENIM JEANS. This is the most worthless documentary I ever seen and I'm a little angry that such a stupid documentary was even created in the first place.

Mate you put the exact same comment on the first instalment of this series..

What exactly is your problem? - and why do you think anyone would give a flying f*rt about your comical whinge?

Thanks for the upload.
Great series.
